All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class LoginActivity
extends CommonActivity

Activity for logging in This activity is used to allow the user to enter their NHS credentials, which logs them into the system.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Aidan Wynne Fewster

Nested Class Summary
private  class LoginActivity.ValidateLoginTask
          InnerClass for validating the users login credentials, called in an AsyncTask to keep the process off the UI thread.
